greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Beginning with 5, primes of the form: least multiple of the previous term followed by a 3. Beginning with 5, a(n) is the least prime of the form k*a(n-1)*10 +3.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jan 03 2006
ext: More terms from Joshua Zucker, Jan 11 2006
